property.name: Flavour
property.value: Serving as a familiar is humiliating. If a demonling outlives his master, he'll seek others to humiliate.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Demonling is immune to the Electricity and Poison traits. Before you act, succeed at a Wisdom or Perception 7 check or the Demonling may not be evaded, and the difficulty of checks to defeat the Demonling is increased by 3. If undefeated, move to a random location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Derakni is immune to the Electricity and Poison traits. If you succeed at an Intelligence or Knowledge 9 check, or if the check has the Force trait, add 5 to your checks against it. Before you act, each character at your location attempts a Wisdom 5 check. For each character that fails, a random character at her location is dealt 2 Combat damage. If defeated, you may immediately attempt to close the location this henchman came from.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The difficulty of checks against the Fiendish Minotaur are increased by twice the scenario's adventure deck number. If you succeed at an Intelligence or Knowledge 7 check, or if the check has the Acid, Electricity, or Force trait, add 3 to your check to defeat the Fiendish Minotaur. Before you act, if this is the first exploration of your turn, the Fiendish Minotaur deals you 1d4-1 Combat damage. If defeated, you may immediately attempt to close the location this henchman came from.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Khorramzadeh may not be evaded and immune to the Electricity, Fire, and Poison traits. Before you act, each character at your location attempts a Consitution or Fortitude 12 check. Each characer that fails is dealt 2d4 Fire damage and moves to a random location. If you fail a check to defeat Khorramzadeh, you die. If defeated, Khorramzadeh deals 2d4 Fire damage to each character at your location.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Heavy Armor Corrupted Elite

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If this card has the Corrupted trait, bury a random card from your discard pile or you may not play this card. Recharge this card to reduce Combat damage dealt to you by 2; you may play another armor on this check. If proficient with heavy armors, you may reveal this card instead of recharging it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When you encounter a bane that may be evaded, recharge this card to evade it or to add 1d4 to your checks to defeat it. Bury this card to explore your location. During this exploration, you may evade any monster you encounter.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Reveal this card to move at the end of your turn; if you have a role card, you may move another character to your location. Put this card on top of your deck to add 1d8 plus the scenario's adventure deck number to your combat check that has the Melee trait. When you reset your hand, you may shuffle this card into your deck.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Owner: Alain

property.name: Subtype
property.value: Mythic Path

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Add your number of mythic charges to your Intelligence or Charisma check. Then you may expend 1 or more charges. If you do, ignore a bane's immunities on this check, and when you assemble your dice, for each charge expended, replace 1 of your highest non-d20 dice with a d20. Expend 5 mythic charges to examine all the cards in a location, character, or blessing deck; you may shuffle that deck.

property.name: Subtype
property.value: Mythic Path

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Add your number of mythic charges to your Strength or Constitution check. Then you may expend 1 or more charges. If you do, when you assemble your dice, for each charge expended, replace 1 of your highest non-d20 dice with a d20 and you may reroll any dice that rolled a value of 1; take the new result. When a character is attempting to close your location, you may expend 5 mythic charges; that character does not need to fulfill the When Closing requirement and automatically closes the location.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Weapon: - Spell: 6 [ ] 7 [ ] 8 [ ] 9 Armor: - Item: 3 [ ] 4 [ ] 5 [ ] 6 Ally: 2 [ ] 3 [ ] 4 Blessing: 4 [ ] 5 [ ] 6

property.name: Flavour
property.value: Eldritch savants revel in unearthing the deepest secrets of spellcasters long departed.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When you attempt a check to acquire a spell ([ ] or an item), you may use your Knowledge skill in place of any listed skill. After you play a spell, you may recharge a random spell from your discard pile ([ ] or shuffle it into your deck). Discard ([ ] or recharge) a spell to reduce Cold or Fire ([ ] or Acid, Electricity, or Force) damage dealt to you ([ ] or to any character at your location) to 0. [ ] You may discard a card to examine the top card of your deck ([ ] and you may recharge the examined card); if it is a spell, you may add it to your hand. [ ] When you play a spell that has the Cold or Fire ([ ] or Acid, Electricity, or Force) traits, you may replace any one of those traits with another of those traits.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: The scholars of the Occularium welcome all to their libraries, but they would prefer you keep it down.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When you attempt a check to acquire a spell ([ ] or an item) ([ ] or you attempt to defeat a barrier), you may use your Knowledge skill in place of any listed skill. After you play a spell, you may recharge a random spell from your discard pile. Discard a spell ([ ] or a boon that has the Book trait) to reduce Cold or Fire ([ ] or Acid, Electricity, or Force) damage dealt to you ([ ] or to any character at your location) to 0. [ ] You may reveal a boon that has the Book trait to add 1d4 ([ ] +1) ([ ] +2) to your check. [ ] At the start of your turn, you may recharge a boon that has the Book trait to examine the top 3 cards of your location deck, or recharge a spell to examine the top 3 cards of your deck. ([ ] Put them back in any order.)

property.name: Flavour
property.value: Iomedae's most trusted champions serve the inheritor with a zeal unmatched in Golarion.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When you attempt a check before you act, you may use your Charisma skill instead of any listed skill. You may discard the top card of your deck to add 1d6 ([ ] +1) to any check by a character at your location. ([ ] If that character defeats a monster on that check, he may draw a card.) ([ ] If the top card has the Heavy Armor or Sword trait, recharge it instead of discarding it.) When you acquire a boon that has the Corrupted trait, bury it. ([ ] If it does not have that trait, you may give it to a character at your location.) [ ] You may be dealt 1 Combat damage to reduce Combat ([ ] or any type of) damage dealt to a character at your location by 1 ([ ] 2) ([ ] 3). When you play a Blessing of Iomedae, a character at your location may shuffle an ally in their discard pile into his deck.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: Guard the wardstones, the sentries are told. Should they fail, seek out more wardstones.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When you attempt a check before you act, you may use your Charisma ([ ] +2) ([ ] +4) skill instead of any listed skill. You may discard the top card of your deck to add 1d6 ([ ] +1) ([ ] +2) ([ ] +3) to any check by a character at your location. ([ ] If that character defeats a monster on that check he may draw a card.) When you acquire a boon that has the Corrupted trait, bury it. ([ ] If it is not your turn, you may then explore again.) [ ] You may add 1d8 and the Magic trait to your check to defeat a bane that has the Demon ([ ] or Undead) trait. [ ] When another character encounters a monster that has the Cultist or Demon trait, you may immediately move to his location.

property.value: You may discard a card to add 1 ([ ] 2) plus its adventure deck number to your check to defeat a non-villain monster. If undefeated, return it to the top of its location deck. Other characters may not play cards or use powers on this check. At the end of your turn, you may recharge any number of weapons ([ ] or allies or items).

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Begin the scenario with this side up. Blessings played by characters at this location add d4 instead of the normal die. At the end of your turn, flip this card.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: This side of this location is always open. Bury a blessing to flip this card.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: This location is never permanently closed.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Blessings played by characters at this location add d12 instead of the normal die. At the end of your turn, or when this location is not occupied, flip this card.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: This side of this location is always temporarily closed.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: This location is never permanently closed.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: The road to the Worldwound has pockets of deep forest laden with entanglements. "Uprooter" elves use the twisted forest to their advantage. An eager toad demon has greater ambitions, so the elves and satyrs must seek aid from outlanders.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Dark Forest Watchtower Wounded Lands Cemetery Abyssal River Guardpost Cavern Molten Pool

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Cohort: Cecilla the Uprooter

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Instead of the first exploration of your turn, you may summon and encounter the henchman Fiendish Tree; if you defeat it, draw the cohort Vinst from the box. If you would encounter a card that has the Animal trait, summon and encounter the henchman Carnivorous Stump instead.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Vescavor Swarm Tangle Traps

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Each character draws a random weapon or spell from the box.
